fields.System.Title: Prerequisites
fields.System.Description: Validate completion of prerequisites & document answers

fields.System.Title: Assess the workload
fields.System.Description: https://review.docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/assess/?branch=pr-en-us-47

fields.System.Title: VM - UX Server
fields.System.Description: VM to be migrated

fields.System.Title: VM - Middle Tier
fields.System.Description: VM to be migrated

fields.System.Title: VM 3 - SQL Server
fields.System.Description: VM to be migrated

fields.System.Title: Test Workload
fields.System.Description: Validate funcationality of the workload

fields.System.Title: Optimize Workload Assets
fields.System.Description: Tune the migrated assets based on observations

fields.System.Title: Promote Workload
fields.System.Description: Tune the migrated assets based on testing feedback

fields.System.Title: Decomission Retired Assets
fields.System.Description: Realize cost savings by terminating retired assets

fields.System.Title: Update migration assessment, decision tree, and tooling
fields.System.Description: Evaluate the results of the migration from the first host to inform iterative processes

fields.System.Title: Migrate VMs
fields.System.Description: Migrate a select group of VMs from the on-premises host to a host on Azure

fields.System.Title: Extend the landing zone for VMWare
fields.System.Description: Resolve defined prerequisites necessary to migrate VMWare assets to Azure

fields.System.Title: Deploy the modified blueprint
fields.System.Description: Update the landing zone blueprint based on the impacted considerations and deploy the modified blueprint.

fields.System.Title: Landing zone considerations
fields.System.Description: Review landing zone considerations to understand the alternative decisions which could impact your landing zone design.

fields.System.Title: CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint
fields.System.Description: Evaluate the CAF Migrate Landing Zone blueprint. If the assumptions and decisions in that article align to your business and technical objectives, the blueprint can be used to create your landing zone.

fields.System.Title: Azure Readiness Guide
fields.System.Description: Review the Azure Readiness Guide to become familiar with the tools and approaches needed in landing zone creation.

fields.System.Title: Update this Cloud Adoption Plan
fields.System.Description: Update this cloud adoption plan to manage effort and change.

fields.System.Title: Skills readiness plan
fields.System.Description: Create a plan for addressing skills readiness gaps.

fields.System.Title: Initial organizational alignment
fields.System.Description: Establish a plan for organizational alignment, included defined RACI diagrams.

fields.System.Title: Digital Estate
fields.System.Description: Inventory and rationalize the digital estate based on assumptions which align with motivations and business outcomes.

fields.System.Title: First Adoption Project
fields.System.Description: In parallel to strategy and plan development, technical staff should begin implementation of a first adoption project to expand cloud skills.

fields.System.Title: Business Case
fields.System.Description: Develop a business case to validate the financial model supporting the motivations and outcomes.

fields.System.Title: Business Outcomes
fields.System.Description: Engage motivated stakeholders and executives to document specific business outcomes.

fields.System.Title: Motivations
fields.System.Description: Meet with key stakeholders and executives to document the motivations which are driving an interest in cloud adoption.
